testcase.classname: Trip Advisor Home Page Functionality test
testcase.name: Trip Advisor flight status functionality test
testcase.system-out: Given I am in Trip Advisor home page........................................passed When I click on TravelForum.................................................passed And I click on Flights......................................................passed And I enter Where from and To field.........................................passed And I enter departure and arrival date......................................passed And I enter person field and close person field.............................passed And I click on find flight button...........................................passed Then I verify COVID-19 Policies is appeared properly........................passed
